Properties.module.name: libpipewire-module-rt
Properties.module.author: Wim Taymans <wim.taymans@gmail.com>
Properties.module.description: Use realtime thread scheduling, falling back to RTKit
Properties.module.usage: [nice.level=<priority: default 20(don't change)>] [rt.prio=<priority: default 88>] [rt.time.soft=<in usec: default -1] [rt.time.hard=<in usec: default -1]

Properties.module.description: Allow clients to create metadata store
